title: Bartender
body:
Detective: Hello, I'm Detective Schmidt.
Detective: Looks like a quite night, do you mind answering some questions?
Bartender: Not at all detective, I gather this is about the murder?
[[Yes it is. |Bartender.Questions]]
[[Yes, how did you know that?|Bartender.Rachael]]

title: Bartender.Questions
body:
Bartender: Ask away.
[[Does the name Rachael ring a bell?|Bartender.Certainly]]
<<if visited ("Bartender.Drink") is false>>
[[Can I get a gin and tonic?|Bartender.Drink]]
<<endif>>

title: Bartender.Rachael
body:
Bartender: One of our regulars, Rachael told me around 20 minutes ago.
[[Anything unusual?|Bartender.Bag]]
[[Thank you for your time.|Bartender.Exit]]

title: Bartender.Certainly
body:
Bertender: Yeah, infact she was in here not 20 minutes ago.
[[Notice anything unusual?|Bartender.Bag]]
[[Thank you for your time.|Bartender.Exit]]

title: Bartender.Drink
body:
Bartender: Is the prohibition a thing again? Is this a sting?
[[Nevermind.|Bartender.Questions]]

title: Bartender.Bag
body:
Bartender: Yeah, she was carrying a duffle bag.
Bartender: She said it was her pool cue.
Bartender: Didn't play a single rack though.
Bartender: Left through the back door into the alley.
<<set $alleyUnlocked to true>>
[[Excuse me, thank you for your time.|Bartender.Exit]]

title: Bartender.Exit
body:
Bartender: Not a worry sir.
Bartender: Have a goodnight.
